text: Futhi ngempela sazithumela izithunywa ngaphambilini kwakho phakathi kwazo kunalezo esikutshelile ngomlando wazo futhi phakathi kwazo kunalezo esingazange sikutshele umlando wazo futhi kwakungesikona okwesithunywa ukuthi size nophawu (noma ivesi) ngaphandle kwemvume kaMvelinqangi, ngakho-ke uma kufika impoqo kaMvelinqangi kwehlulelwa ngeqiniso futhi bazolahlekelwa abalandeli bamanga
